title: dont give me leave buster
body:
my mouse broke so i couldnt move, i was playing with a friend (katzone).
i couldnt move anymore so i got killed and couldnt play and i was afk, some people did report me and some people didnt cause they understood the problem, i hope you dont give me leavebuster just because my mouse broke.

replies.body: Oh no, sorry to hear about your mouse!  Did you end up having to get a new one?  You don't have to worry about [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) if it was just for one game.  It may only happen if you have a history of it.  Hope that helps offer some relief!
